# helios Issue Templates

This directory contains GitHub issue templates for the helios project. These templates help maintain consistency and ensure all necessary information is provided when creating issues.

## Available Templates

The following templates are available when you create a new issue:

- **Bug Report** (`bug_report.yml`) – Report bugs, crashes, or unexpected behavior
- **Feature Request** (`feature_request.yml`) – Propose new features or enhancements
- **Refactoring Proposal** (`refactoring.yml`) – Propose code improvements or technical debt reduction
- **CI/CD Issues** (`ci-cd.yml`) – Report issues with the ci/cd-pipeline

---

## Complete Guide

For comprehensive guidelines on submitting issues see the [Issue Submission Guide](../../docs/issue_submission_guide.md)**

This guide is also available on the [helios website](https://helios.garagecraft.games/docs/contributing/issue-submission).

---

## Quick Checklist

Before submitting an issue:

- [ ] Search existing issues to avoid duplicates
- [ ] Choose the correct template (bug, feature, refactoring)
- [ ] Fill out all required fields thoroughly
- [ ] Provide minimal reproducible examples for bugs
- [ ] Use appropriate labels (type, component, priority)
- [ ] Consider performance implications if relevant
- [ ] Review the [Issue Submission Guide](../../docs/issue_submission_guide.md)
